column1: I use Garnier products frequently. I have used their shampoo and styling products. This was new for me to try their facial mosturizer. I absolutely loved it!! It goes on nice and smooth on my skin, is not greasy or oily feeling and really works to help keep my skin youthful looking. I recommend it to my family and friends.

I love all the garnier products, except the moisture rescue, its gel and has alcohol in it, so I did not like it. But, this one is great for the skin, good feel and smell under make-up. You just do not get much in the 1.6 like this and most are 1.7 jars. Honestly, I do not think anything is going to work miracles, they just make you feel better for awhile and feels good on the skin!

I just happened to pick this up while looking for a serum. OMG! This cream-serum mix is beyond great. It's so hydrating and has helped the bags under my eyes and my lines. I have to relate it to this since this is the only new product I added to my skin care routine. I just found out they are discontinuing this. Why? There's so many great reviews on this. Why would they discontinue a phenomenol product like this? I'm so upset. I thought I finally found something that works!
It's great for the dry Arizona air but you'll sweat to death with it on in humid climates like WI, NC or TX. I know. Tried it. I have to switch my face cream in humid climates to something lighter.
the price is right ! this is a very good every day night moisturizer...smells good too. a little goes a long way and leaves your skin feeling fresh, uplifted,you will look good under your make up.

Favorite and Best moisturizer I have ever used. I have extremely sensitive skin and can not use anything with retinol, so that basically rules out most all anti-aging/wrinkle products. This however has no retinol and leaves my skin feeling soft and my skin tone even. Since I began using it, people always compliment my complexion and ask what kind of moisturizer I use. Highly recommend for anyone with sensitive skin.

It took just two weeks for me to see how well this product works. Ultra-Lift Anti-wrinkle firming moisturizer works great. I can see the difference. It has firmed up my bagging under eyes, jawline and neck. All of my face has firmed up. Not a dry drawing firm, but a supple youthful looking firm. I am getting comments on how well I look. I tell everyone what helped me so much. Thanks to Garnier for making a product that works at a price even a person on fixed in come can afford. Thank You Garnier.

Don't use this product unless you have enough money to keep buying new clothes. I have been using this product for 3 days and the shirts I have worn the last 3 days are now ruined.
